_header: A knight that is hardy as a lion
_description: John Lydgate, eight stanzas expounding refrain: ‘None of all these I doo yow well assure / Off kyndely ryght may no while endure’ — eight stanzas rhyme royal

CamTCC599.First Lines:
[A] Knyght that ys as hardy as a lyonNe a Squyer that ys
                    AmorousNe a goshawke that fleeth for the heronNe a grehounde on boorys
                    coragyous…
CamTCC599.Last Lines:
…That noone of all these I do yow ensureOf kyndly ryght may
                    long endure
